Author: JoeEntrepreneur
Title: Any suggestions on having PR before launch? About to launch Onista.com in early June and want to prepare the PR before the launch.

Author: JoeEntrepreneur
Content:
Sure.\nThis is a good idea. I am launching http://www.onista.com in June time-frame and would be nice to have other folks look at it and give valuable feedback.

Our team will also help out others to test their apps.\n
